replies.author: 酥宁最酥啦
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: ww龙mc
replies.txt_content:
尝试换一个格子来进行商店创建 
或检查auto-sign的值是否是true

replies.author: Qwe_Sakura
replies.txt_content: 大佬QS的配置文件里auto-sign有没有为true啊

replies.author: Qwe_Sakura
replies.txt_content: 讲道理除了自己改了配置文件 牌子是会显示的 emmmm你把这个商店重新做一下

replies.author: lingdidi
replies.txt_content: 直接考虑换个qs插件试试？？？
